body:
Comment 4 by **girard.m1**: 
The change list is at : http://golang.org/cl/1739046

Hum... I did the setup for sending codereviews. The python script seems to create a
changelist, but exit with the http error 403:
mathieu@mathieu-desktop:~/Sources/go$ hg change
Email (login for uploading to codereview.appspot.com): girard.m1@gmail.com
Password for girard.m1@gmail.com: 
Saving authentication cookies to
/home/mathieu/.codereview_upload_cookies_codereview.appspot.com
Issue created. URL: http://golang.org/cl/1739046
abort: HTTP Error 403: Forbidden
